thread.title: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble
thread.title_full: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble

title: Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble
text:
> Sports Pirates head into offseason after another October stumble Pittsburgh Pirates first baseman Pedro Alvarez dives for a foul ball in the photo pit during the fifth inning of the National League wild card baseball game against the Chicago Cubs, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh. Alvarez was unable to make the catch. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
